Definition at line 53 of file SVivaldi.cc.

{
    // calculate loss factor
    loss = lossC + (1 - lossC) * loss;
    if(fabs(dist - SIMTIME_DBL(rtt)) > lossResetLimit) loss = 0.0;

    return coordC * weight * (1 - loss);
}
